name: Project Vesica
description:
You awaken in the snowy plains, trying to figure out your bearings and where to go next. At night, your energy slowly depletes and you have to seek light under a lamp post/ street light.

This is a fairly long game that could take up to 30mins to complete. Made in 14 days with GMS2 for the notice me game jam with the theme "Then The Night Changed Everything". I finished to realize they wanted an ARCADE-type game rip.

A and D to move.

W and S to climb.

Spacebar to jump, you can double jump.

Esc to Pause/Un-pause.

At night your energy will drain, so make sure to hide under lamp posts.

//CHEATS if needed

Pressing 'insert' gives 200 data

Fonts used:

  1. Atlantis International
  2. Moonhouse

Some Music And SFX used are CC0 from the following:
